Name: mkdir_command
description: The shell command to create directory

Name: results_dir
description: Directory where the results will be stored

Name: study_tped
description: The path to the TPED file of the study

Name: study_tfam
description: The path to the TFAM fiel of the study

Name: study_root_basename
description: The full path without the extension of the study file

Name: pattern_reference_map
description: The string pattern of the reference genetic map

Name: pattern_reference_haps
description: The string pattern of the reference haps

Name: pattern_reference_legend
description: The string pattern of the reference legend

Name: study_base_name
description: The basename of the input study. i.e. the basename of to/path/study.ped is study

Name: keep_filename
description: Samples to keep for the analysis

Name: chromosome
description: Python list of chromosome numbers that the imputation will run

Name: output_files
description: List of all the final output files of the imputation commands

Name: path_to_wikipl_scripts
description: Path where the python scripts are located

Name: experiment_name
description: Name of this experiment and directory under temporary files will be stored

Name: study_PEDMAP_chr
description: The study file of each chromosome

Name: scriptName
description: The name of the output script
